id.description: A unique identifier for the course of action.

type.description: The type of object, always 'course-of-action' for a MITRE ATT&CK course of action.

created.description: The date and time the course of action was created.

modified.description: The date and time the course of action was last modified.

name.description: The name of the course of action.

description.description: A brief description of the course of action and what it entails.
